name: business_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yelp_reviews.
Tool description: Extremely Fast and Simple API to search for businesses and get their reviews on Yelp in real-time.
API description: Search for Yelp businesses by keyword and location, with options for pagination, price range, domain, and sorting order.

location.description: The location to search for businesses (e.g., "New York, NY, USA").

start.description:
Number of results to skip. Mainly used for pagination.

**Default:** `0`.

**Allowed values:** positive integers.

price_range.description:
Find business with specific price ranges, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `$`, `$$`, `$$$`, `$$$`.

**Examples:**
- *$$*
- *$,$$*

yelp_domain.description:
The yelp domain to use for the search.

**Default:** `yelp.com`

**Supported domains:** `yelp.com`, `yelp.com.au`, `yelp.co.nz`, `ms.yelp.my`, `yelp.cz`, `yelp.dk`, `yelp.de`, `yelp.at`, `de.yelp.ch`, `en.yelp.be`, `yelp.ca`, `en.yelp.com.hk`, `en.yelp.my`, `en.yelp.com.ph`, `yelp.ie`, `yelp.com.sg`, `en.yelp.ch`, `yelp.co.uk`, `yelp.com.ar`, `yelp.cl`, `yelp.es`, `yelp.com.mx`, `fil.yelp.com.ph`, `yelp.fr`, `fr.yelp.ca`, `fr.yelp.ch`, `fr.yelp.be`, `yelp.no`, `yelp.pl`, `yelp.pot`, `yelp.com.br`, `fi.yelp.

sort_by.description:
Return the results in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `RECOMMENDED`

**Allowed values:** `RECOMMENDED, HIGHEST_RATED, REVIEW_COUNT`
